#TECNOUnFold Contest: Answer 5 simple questions and stand a chance to win the new TECNO Phantom V Fold

By
Brand Story
-
Published On: April 28, 2023 | Last Updated: May 31, 2023

[Update]: A huge congratulations to all the winners of the #TECNOUnFold Contest.

The emergence of foldable smartphones in the tech industry has generated considerable excitement and for good reason. These devices combine the convenience of a standard smartphone with the immersive screen real estate of a tablet, offering users the best of both worlds. The TECNO Phantom V Fold is one of the latest entries in this category, boasting a cutting-edge folding design as well as powerful specifications that are sure to impress.

The TECNO Phantom V fold features a large 6.42-inch FHD+ display. However, unfolding the device reveals a massive 7.85-inch 2K display! Both these displays feature AMOLED panels and refresh rates that go up to 120Hz. Further, when the superbly engineered hinge ensures that there is virtually no crease when the device is unfolded. As if that wasn’t impressive enough, the phone also comes with a 50MP triple rear camera and the whole device is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 9000+. The cherry on top is the 5000mAh battery and support for 45W SuperCharge tech. Want to know more about the TECNO Phantom V Fold? All you need to do is click here!

So, would you like to win this awesome new smartphone? Of course, you do! And the best part is that it is extremely easy! All you need to do is participate in our contest.

Loading…

Prizes for the Winners:

  1. One lucky winner to get the new TECNO Phantom V Fold
  2. Two lucky winners to get a goodie bag each from TECNO

Steps to participate in the contest:

  1. Participate in the contest by answering all questions
  2. Participants have to answer all the questions correctly
  3. Participants must enter their email ID (mandatory)

Terms and Conditions:

  1. The contest begins on April 28th, and will end on May 7th, 2023, at 11:59 PM.
  2. Only Indian nationals are eligible to participate in the contest
  3. Participants need to answer all questions correctly and enter their email IDs to be eligible to win.
  4. Winners will be announced 8 -10 days post the completion of the contest
  5. Winners will be notified by email and will be disqualified if they don’t acknowledge our communication within 48 hours. In such a case, the prize(s) will be given to the next set of eligible winner(s).
  6. 91mobiles reserves the right to choose the winners at its discretion.
